message_1: A car travels at a constant speed and covers a distance of 96 miles in 2 hours. What is the average speed of the car in miles per hour (mph)?
message_2:
To find the average speed of the car, we can use the formula:

Average speed = Total distance / Total time

In this case, the total distance is 96 miles and the total time is 2 hours. So, we can plug these values into the formula:

Average speed = 96 miles / 2 hours

Average speed = 48 miles per hour (mph)

The average speed of the car is 48 mph.
